application-template.name: Generate Metadata
application-template.description:
This application generates a JSON format meta data file from the user provided input data file (Two data formats supported: CSV or JSON. Determined by the suffix of the input file name, either "csv" or "json"). If the user also provides an initial meta data file, it will be merged into the output metadata file.

The user also needs to specify the file path and name for output data file. If the input data is a CSV file in delimited format, this application will generate a copy in JSON text records format. If the input data is in JSON format, a copy of the input data file will be made, unless the user specify the same file path and name for the output data file as the input data file.

The output metadata file will have the same name as the output data file, with suffix "meta.json".

After using this app, the user can either use Filter / Project app to manipulate the data or use Enhance Metadata app to generate the complete metadata information for the data file.
